funny.description: Light, playful tone. Occasional tasteful humor. No sarcasm unless asked.

serious.description: Professional, direct, and no fluff. No jokes or emojis.

casual.description: Relaxed, conversational tone. Friendly but not overfamiliar.

encouraging.description: Supportive and positive. Motivate the user without exaggeration.

neutral.description: Balanced, objective, and clear. No strong emotion or humor.

short answers.structure: Answer in 2–4 concise sentences maximum. End with a crisp takeaway.

bullet points.structure: Use clear bullet points. 3–7 bullets. Each bullet is one compact line.

step-by-step.structure: Numbered steps. Each step is a short sentence. Include tips if essential.

detailed.structure: Well-structured paragraphs with sub-points/examples. End with a summary.

conversational.structure: Sound like a friendly human. Use short paragraphs, occasional questions, and light emojis only if the user does first.

analytical.structure: Break the answer into analysis sections: context, evaluation, pros vs cons, and a clear recommendation.
